TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XpsFont extends System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別具有公用建構函式。The class has no public constructor. 使用將字型加入並取得它的參考新的文件中的方法。Use the method to add a font and obtain a reference to it in a new document. 使用方法來取得現有文件中的字型參考。Use the method to obtain a font reference in an existing document. 根據設定的和，例如和，排清作業的方法類別可能會延遲到整個已關閉。Based on settings of and , such as and , the flush operation of the method of the class may be delayed until the whole is closed. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將字型。The following example shows how to add fonts to an . [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#xpscreateaddpageresources)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsObfuscated As Boolean
public: property bool IsObfuscated { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出字型是否模糊化。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the font is obfuscated.

value.span: 如果字型為模糊化，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the font is obfuscated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需字型模糊化的詳細資訊，請參閱區段 2.1.7.3"內嵌字型模糊化" *XML Paper Specification (XPS)*下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。For more information about font obfuscation, see Section 2.1.7.3 "Embedded Font Obfuscation" in the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsRestricted { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出使用這個字型的文字是否可以修改。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether text that uses this font can be modified.

value.span: 如果使用這個字型的文字可以變更或編輯，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if text that uses this font can be changed or edited; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 受限制的字型的相關使用資訊，請參閱*XML Paper Specification (XPS)*下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。For more information about the use of restricted fonts, see the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ObfuscateFontData (byte[] fontData, Guid guid);
.method public static hidebysig void ObfuscateFontData(unsigned int8[] fontData, valuetype System.Guid guid) cil managed
public: static void ObfuscateFontData(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ fontData, Guid guid);

param.name: guid
param.span: 使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/includes/tlasharptla-guid-md.md)] 將 fontdata 模糊化。

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/includes/tlasharptla-guid-md.md)] to use to obfuscate the fontdata.

summary.span: 模糊化字型的字樣資料。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供給使用當您遵循和法令義務模糊化授權專屬的字型。The method is provided for use when you are legally obligated to obfuscate licensed proprietary fonts. 雖然這個方法不會提供加密，方法可以用來禁止使用者從解壓縮的專屬[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)]字型和其他用途的個別安裝。While this method does not provide encryption, the method can be used to inhibit users from unzipping proprietary [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] fonts and installing them separately for other uses. 如需字型模糊化的詳細資訊，請參閱區段 2.1.7.3"內嵌字型模糊化" *XML Paper Specification (XPS)*下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。For more information about font obfuscation, see Section 2.1.7.3 "Embedded Font Obfuscation" in the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
